description:
Nanahoshi Ren a first-year university student taking up Law and the vocalist for the band Argonavis.
Unable to forget the excitement of an outdoor live Ren saw when he was a kid, he started singing with the dream of standing on the big stage in the future. Initially, due to a negative past experience from joining a choir club in middle school, he continued to sing in karaoke rooms privately. He joined Argonavis after being scouted by Yuto Goryo, who was looking for a vocalist.
Source: ARGONAVIS from BanG Dream! Wiki
name: Nanahoshi Ren
